Package command

Class RemoveRequestCommand

java.lang.Object
command.RemoveRequestCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
Command
public class RemoveRequestCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command

Remove Request Command Class

The Remove Request Command defines the command to be called when user confirms the removal of a request

See Also:
Command, MVCController
